title.narrative: Building community capacity to climate change response and supporting to use renewable energy to improve local livelihoods

description.narrative: The project aims to raise community awareness and building capacity to respond to climate change through communication training and effective use of renewable energy sources. The project activities include i) raising the awareness of local authorities and local people in Quang Phuoc commune Quang Dien district and school students in two neighbouring communes with regard to climate change response and adaptation, ii) supporting and increasing local community access to advanced techniques for safe and effecti ve pig breeding and use of biogas works, iii) enhancing local government officials and people capacities to respond to climate change and iv) advocating for the integration of climate change issues into local socio economic development plan.
